channel.title: http://www.Melify.com
channel.description: Welcome to Melify. You can use the following links to get to our content

item.title: Usability and Rapid Prototyping
item.description: Learn how prototyping improves your product and different ways to do this

item.title: Internet Toolkit Website
item.description: Melify Internet Toolkit is unlike what you have heard from others. It is a complete language around HTML; so you code at a much higher level than those TAGS you are used to. A common remote library allows you to completely separate applications from ever moving changes in the backend devlopment. You can easily connect to your database and run it on any Operating System. From MacOSX, Windows to any branch of unix. No other compnay can offer anything close to this.

item.title: Example Notebooks
item.description: There are many notebooks to choose from and best of all. You never have to change your code. Each notebook is created with a couple of lines of code. Not bad ! Click on the link above, view code and live examples.

item.title: Toolkit Helper
item.description: Use this link to looup widgets their associated code

item.title: Toolkit Videos Online
item.description: Watch videos on how to create applications in a very short time
